channel.title: Fresh Install of the game ona new computer won't start
channel.description: I tried to run it in windowed mode with no borders an tried reinstalling the VC pckages as well as DX9 to no avail ...

item.title: Fresh Install of the game ona new computer won't start
item.dc:creator: RedEye9
item.description:
Here is a thread with a fix for the game not starting.

steamcommunity.com

Game won't start :: Black Mesa General Discussions

Brand new laptop install, it says it's installing direct x but then doesn't and the game doesn't load. Windows 10. Does anyone have a functioning direct x link for windows 10? Other than that I'm not sure what's doing it. I tried putting it in...

item.description:

item.title: Fresh Install of the game ona new computer won't start
item.dc:creator: RedEye9
item.description:
Has the computer installed all of its Windows Updates?

Restart your computer and try again.

Also post your system specs.
